text: This remarkable man of medicine, whom Sir Francis Burdett described to Anglesey increasing number of disciples among unorthodox medical men in the cities of Europe. One of these was the Neapolitan, Dr Giuseppe Mauro, whom Anglesey consulted in May 1834.
handwritten_text: This remarkable man of medicine, whom Sir Francis Burdett described to Anglesey increasing number of disciples among unorthodox medical men in the cities of Europe. One of these was the Neapolitan, Dr Giuseppe Mauro, whom Anglesey consulted in May 1834.
